name: ECE 279
title: Optimization and Control for Electric Power Systems
description: Provides a comprehensive overview of power systems. Students learn how mathematical tools are used for the system planning and operation. Advanced topics include smart grids, electric vehicles and energy data analytics.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students. Undergraduates admitted with permission of the instructor.

class_notes: Please note that the instructor for this course is Professor Yu Zhang. His email address iszhangy@ucsc.edu
